page.title: Download DailyNotes
page.lead: Download DailyNotes for your watch now and enjoy the most up-to-date journaling features with the best experience.

alert.title: Download temporarily unavailable
alert.description: Downloads are temporarily unavailable due to force majeure.

android.title: Android download
android.requirement: Works with Android 5.1 (7.1.1 recommended) or later.

security.title: Verification and safe download
security.body: We strongly recommend downloading only from our official website. If your download appears corrupted or is flagged by antivirus software, please report it. Click <icon/> to copy the SHA256 checksum for verification.

dialog.title: Download notice
dialog.body:
The site is currently undergoing regulatory filing, so domestic download options are temporarily unavailable.

We provide an overseas download (hosted in Singapore). Continue if you consent; otherwise, close this dialog.

hashPending.title: Checksum not ready
hashPending.description: The SHA256 checksum is still loading. Please try again shortly.

hashCopied.title: Copied!
hashCopied.description: The SHA256 checksum has been copied to your clipboard.

hashCopyFailed.title: Copy failed
hashCopyFailed.description: Please try again later or copy the checksum manually.

downloadUnavailable.title: Download unavailable
downloadUnavailable.description: Downloads are temporarily unavailable due to force majeure.

downloadStarted.title: Download started
downloadStarted.description: The file is downloading in the background. Check your notifications for progress.
